card_text: 2 "Shaddoll" monsters with different Attributes$NMust first be Fusion Summoned. Cannot be destroyed by battle. You can only use each of the following effects of "El Shaddoll Apkallone" once per turn.$N●If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up card on the field; negate its effects.$N●If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Shaddoll" card from your Deck or GY to your hand, then discard 1 card.
